spectratmo.planets¶

Planets¶

class spectratmo.planets.Planet(name, radius=1.0, Omega=1.0, pressure_m=1.0)[source]¶

Bases: object

Represent a planet.

Parameters :

name : str

Name of the planet.

radius : number

Radius (meters).

Omega : number

Rotation frequency (Hz).

pressure_m : number

Mean pressure at sea level (hPa).

Classes

Earth
Mars
